tool_description: This API currently helps to query for prices of products from Amazon. We will support more other sites/brands soon. Stay tune!
name: Price Tracking Tools
title: Price Tracking Tools

api_list.name: camelizer/get-prices
api_list.description: Get latest prices, history highest/lowest prices of a product from Amazon

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description: The asin number of a product from Amazon, and must be in the correct format. Ex : B08QB93S6R

api_list.name: camelizer/get-price-chart
api_list.description: Get pricing history chart of a product from Amazon

required_parameters.name: asin
required_parameters.description: The asin number of a product from Amazon, and must be in the correct format. Ex : B08QB93S6R

optional_parameters.name: tp
optional_parameters.description: Time period. One of the following : 1m|3m|6m|1y|all
